full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Naval Distillate Fuel

#### Solicitation Number
WS3790093928

#### Publication Date
December 14, 2022

#### Tender Closing Date
December 29, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Number
1

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Objectives

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) to solicit bids for the supply of 350,000 litres of Naval Distillate Fuel.

#### Deliverables

The Naval Distillate Fuel is required to be delivered by truck to the CCGS Cygnus, Newdock, St. John’s Dockyard Limited, and is estimated to be delivered in mid-January 2023.

#### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Contact Information
Erin O'Neill
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Canada
Email: [erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not provided
Fax: Not provided
